title: Handkerchief, "Samuel Slater, The Father of American Manufacturers", ca. 1890
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
inscribed:
Printed on lower right corner: "CRANSTON PRINT WORKS CO. CRANSTON, R.I. PRINTERS"
Printed on lower left corner: "ENGRAVED AT JAMES PROVAN & SONS', PROVIDENCE RI"
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 56 x 64 cm (22 1/16 x 25 3/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Lawrence Thurman in memory of Alice Baldwin Beer
description:
Small border with black lines. The field has a building on each corner with legend underneath. In the center is a portrait with signature and legend, "SAMUEL STARTER / THE FATHER OF / AMERICAN MANUFACTURERS" and seal.
Selvedge on both sides and hemmed top and bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief, "Samuel Slater, The Father of American Manufacturers", ca. 1890.
ca. 1890. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave. Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Lawrence Thurman in memory of Alice Baldwin Beer. 1982-80-1.
